    BannerPagerView.OnBannerClickListener  
    IBannerPageView
    Created by Edgar on 2016/12/2.
    ImageLoader
    Created by Edgar on 2016/12/3.
    LoopViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
    Callback interface for responding to changing state of the selected page.
    LoopViewPager.PageTransformer
    A PageTransformer is invoked whenever a visible/attached page is scrolled.

    类 说明

    Created by Edgar on 2016/12/2.

    BuildConfig  
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumentation test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    LoopViewPager
    Layout manager that allows the user to flip left and right through pages of data.
    LoopViewPager.LayoutParams
    Layout parameters that should be supplied for views added to a ViewPager.
    LoopViewPager.SavedState
    This is the persistent state that is saved by ViewPager.
    LoopViewPager.SimpleOnPageChangeListener
    Simple implementation of the LoopViewPager.OnPageChangeListener interface with stub implementations of each method.
